subject: windows xp OEM
body:
Fooled once shame on you, fooled twice shame on me.

Pictures are for entertainment, messages should be delivered by Western Union.

Corporations cannot commit treason, or be outlawed or excommunicated, for they have no souls.

There is only one thing harder than looking for a dewdrop in the dew, and that is fishing for a clam in the clam chowder.

The anarchist and the Christian have a common origin.

If you wish to be brothers, let the arms fall from your hands. One cannot love while holding offensive arms.

To know the will of God is the greatest knowledge! To do the will of God is the greatest achievement.

Perhaps one has to be very old before one learns to be amused rather than shocked.

We often do good in order that we may do evil with impunity.

To copy others is necessary, but to copy oneself is pathetic.

Gifts dissolve rocks.

Men always fall for frigid women because they put on the best show.

A man makes inferiors his superiors by heat self-control is the rule.
